level.heading: Penalty for failure to provide correct information.
level.text: Any parent, guardian, custodian, principal, or teacher of a minor who has reached the age of 3 years who willfully neglects or refuses to provide the information required by §§ 38-202 through 38-206, or who knowingly makes any false statement, shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Feb. 4, 1925, 43 Stat. 807, ch. 140, Art. II, § 3; renumbered as Art. II, § 5 and amended, Mar. 8, 1991, D.C. Law 8-247, § 2(a), 38 DCR 376.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-247
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-201.
